record.title: LIVING KIDNEY ORGAN DONATION CLARIFICATION ACT OF 2007

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask consent that the HELP Committee be discharged from further consideration of S. 487 and the Senate proceed to its consideration.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered. The clerk will report the bill by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: I understand there is an amendment at the desk. I ask consent the amendment be considered and agreed to, the bill, as amended, be read three times and passed, the motion to reconsider be laid on the table, and any statements be printed at the appropriate place in the Record.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
